column1: Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 2017 and 2018.
Authors: Rachel E. Morgan, Ph.D., and Barbara A. Oudekerk, Ph.D., BJS Statisticians
Note: Includes violent crimes in which the offender possessed, showed, or used a firearm. See appendix table 16 for standard errors.
‡Significant difference from comparison year at the 90% confidence level.
a/An incident is a specific criminal act involving one or more victims.
b/Each victimization represents one person involved in an incident.
c/Rate is per 1,000 persons age 12 or older. See appendix table 26 for person populations.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 2017 and 2018.
